  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:openlearn.open.ac.uk:TL_MFLT5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>TL_MFLT5</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">Teaching languages: language awareness</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtende Sprachen: 
Sprachenbewußtsein</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Langages d'enseignement : conscience de 
langage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Línguas ensinando: consciência da língua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingue d'istruzione: consapevolezza di 
linguaggio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γλώσσες διδασκαλίας: γλωσσική συνειδητοποίηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lenguajes de enseñanza: conocimiento del 
lenguaje</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">This unit explores phonic and historical connections between languages and suggests how such knowledge might be used when teaching MFL.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Education</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Entymology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Teaching_language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Teaching_techniques</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Maßeinheit erforscht die phonischen und 
historischen Anschlüsse zwischen Sprachen und schlägt vor, wie 
solches Wissen verwendet werden konnte, als, MFL unterrichtend.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette unité explore les connexions phoniques et 
historiques entre les langages et suggère comment une telle 
connaissance pourrait être utilisée en enseignant MFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta unidade explora conexões phonic e 
históricas entre línguas e sugere como tal conhecimento pôde ser 
usado ao ensinar MFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa unità esplora i collegamenti phonic e 
storici fra i linguaggi e suggerisce come tale conoscenza potrebbe 
essere usata quando insegna MFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η μονάδα ερευνά τις φωνητικές και ιστορικές 
συνδέσεις μεταξύ των γλωσσών και προτείνει πώς τέτοια γνώση να 
χρησιμοποιηθεί κατά το διδασκαλία MFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta unidad explora conexiones phonic e 
históricas entre los lenguajes y sugiere cómo tal conocimiento pudo 
ser utilizado al enseñar MFL.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ausbildung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Entymology</string>
